Catholic Worker Communities

The vitality of The Catholic Worker Movement today is best seen in the life and work of over 220 communities worldwide.

This section includes a directory of houses, stories of hospitality, the works of mercy, and actions of protest and resistance.

Visit individual community websites and consider volunteering at a house.

"We were just sitting there talking when Peter Maurin came in. . . .

"It all happened while we sat there talking, and it is still going on."
Dorothy Day
